welcome_message_body: Welcome to Dinslaken, where historic charm and modern amenities blend seamlessly. Explore our beautiful city known for its stunning architecture, vibrant culture, and friendly locals. Enjoy your stay and immerse yourself in all that Dinslaken has to offer!

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Main terminal with domestic and international flights

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Secondary terminal with mainly low-cost and regional flights

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: A modern terminal used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Unlimited free WiFi access throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Weeze Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access the WiFi for free for up to 2 hours.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Stadtlohn Vreden Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Stadtlohn Vreden Airport, handling freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
